meanings.definition: A type of vehicle used for transportation.
meanings.sent1: The carroches parked outside the school were shiny and colorful.
meanings.sent2: I rode in a carroches to get to the market.
meanings.sent3: The carroches in the movie were talking and had personalities.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a fleet of carroches.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the carroches rumbling down the street was deafening.

meanings.definition: The act of driving or riding in a carroches.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the carroches through the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The experience of riding in a carroches was exhilarating.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to be in a carroches while playing in the park.
meanings.sent4: His words carried her away on a magical carroches ride.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the carroches wheels on the road was soothing.

meanings.definition: To transport or convey in a carroches.
meanings.sent1: They carroches the goods to the market every morning.
meanings.sent2: I will carroches the furniture to the new house.
meanings.sent3: The team decided to carroches their equipment in the large carroches.
meanings.sent4: Her smile carroches warmth and kindness to everyone she meets.
meanings.sent5: The music carroches emotions that words cannot express.
